summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Agency Management MVP. Backend APIs working perfectly (14/14 tests passed). Frontend authentication, navigation, and CRUD operations tested successfully. Fixed critical Select component bug in invoice creation.
passed_tests: User registration and login flow with JWT authentication
Dashboard loading with stats display (Total Clients, Active Projects, Total Revenue, Pending Invoices)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Clients, Projects, Team, Invoices)
Client CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Project CRUD operations with client linking
Invoice CRUD operations with items and calculations
Backend API endpoints (auth, dashboard stats, clients, projects, team, invoices)
Data persistence and relationships between clients, projects, and invoices
Professional UI design with muted blues and greens color scheme

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all core features working after bug fix)
